install.name: Communicator Subscribe
install.author: Granholmcms.com
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: This module displays a simple HTML form to your users so they can subscribe to your newsletter (requires the Communicator component).

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Choose the layout to be horizontal or vertical.

param.name: show_pretext
param.label: Show the pre-text?
param.description: Set whether or not to show a pre-text.

param.name: pretext
param.label: The Text -before- the Subscribe Form
param.description: Just some Text the will be shown -before- the Subscribe Form

param.name: chars_limit
param.label: Limit number of Characters for -Name- Field?
param.description: Limits the Number of Charcaters for the -Name- Field to the Number that can be specified below.

param.name: chars
param.label: Number of chars for Character Limit.
param.description: Used when the Character limit is enabled. The value specifies the number of characters that may used for the -Name- Field.

param.name: hide_name_field
param.label: Hide the -Name- Field?
param.description: When enabled, Users must fill in a name with their subscription.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
